ing: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "You can add other fruits such as mandarin oranges and bananas to this creamy fruit and marshmallow salad."
ins:
In a large bowl, fold together the condensed milk and whipped topping.
Add the pie filling, pineapple, marshmallows and pecans (if desired). Mix well and refrigerate until chilled.
